name: Drinks & Duels
description:
Duels & Drinks is a short single player card game made during the Spain Devs Game Jam II.

"In a time where dueling was forbidden under penalty of a heavy sanction even to the ones who loosed, duelists secretely challenged each other in taverns. But it wasn't mead what they were drinking..."

Use your cards and test your drinking unkown weird drinks in this duel.
